title: tanjam enrAlE (varNam)
sahitya:
tanjam enrAlE nenjam aruL shurattE valiya taNmukhil pOlE vandu anjElenru uvandaruLum jaya


anupallavi

  vanjam koNDOr pOla vanmam koNDE migha manam
 varundumen aruL shiriduminri maranda vindai ennenbEn ayyA


caraNam    mAdavar paNI kapAli Ala manamuNDO ilaiyO shol uyar
